Responsive Email Boilerplate

This template is a working basis when you want to build a template for emailings. Here's how it adapts to mobile phones:

On computer:
  • The maximum width is set at 600px
  • A padding of 20px is applied on the left and right, which means that the content occupies a actual width of 560px
On phone:
  • The content area becomes fluid and occupies 100% 100% of the width
  • Below a width of 480px, the padding is then 10px on the left and right
  • Images size decrease according to the available width
  • Columns are placed one below the other
